personalDetails.description: I am a Software Engineer with a strong foundation in computer science and experience in software development. I am passionate about building scalable software applications, creating effective solutions, and learning new technologies. I am a quick learner, a team player, and a problem solver with excellent communication skills.

description: Designed and implemented core Warehouse Management System (WMS) modules, including Purchase Orders, handling over 500+ daily transactions.
Optimized database performance with MongoDB Atlas and Atlas Search indexes, reducing query response times by 400%, improving app responsiveness by 30%.
Architected a billing service for 50+ clients, managing assignment tracking, usage monitoring, and cost control, boosting operational efficiency by 20%.
Automated workflows using Temporal, speeding up post-packing workflows and FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon) shipment creation, reducing manual efforts by 35%.
Implemented product bundle management, improving bundle tracking accuracy.
Developed 12+ API integrations (REST, GraphQL, SOAP), and npm packages expanding system capabilities and improving external service interoperability, supporting 5+ external partners.

Developed EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) flows, streamlining B2B transactions between 2 major partners, ensuring data is accurately converted to user-friendly formats, improving transaction time by 10%.
Created a dashboard using Redash and MongoDB Aggregation tracking daily usage for 100+ active users.
Built and Deployed a microservice for real-time notifications increasing user engagement by 30%.
Managed AWS services (EC2, ECR, ECS, SNS, SQS) handling 10000+ daily requests and ensuring scalability
Built REST APIs for managing activity logs and workspace details improving data accuracy by 15%.

personalProjects.name: GrainShield : Grain Moisture Detection
personalProjects.description: Engineered an IoT system for real-time grain moisture monitoring, cutting grain loss by 30%.

personalProjects.name: Zournal
personalProjects.description: A solution to make journaling easy by tracking daily tasks, notes, and upcoming events.

personalProjects.name: Vehicle Finance Management System
personalProjects.description: Designed a DBMS for bank agents to manage vehicle loans, boosting recovery efficiency by 20%.

skills: AWS (EC2, ECR, ECS, S3, ElastiCache, SNS, SQS)
